message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $120.

Hi Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate the uniqueness of the item, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $95 for the product. Looking forward to your response.

Hi Bob, I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $95. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $110. This is a fair price considering the product's value and uniqueness.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I still feel that $95 would be a fair price for the product. I hope you can consider my offer, and we can reach an agreement.

Hi Bob, I understand you're still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go as low as $95. I'm willing to compromise a bit further, so I'm counteroffering at $105. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I think it's still a great deal for you.
